question: Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria commonly called “The Global Fund” or “GFATM” was established In which year  ?
explanation: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria commonly called “The Global Fund” or “GFATM” is an international financing and partnership  organization. It is designed to accelerate the end of AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria as epidemics.
